item.title: A little life hack when you work with Azure Service Bus and ASP.NET Core
item.description: If you work with Azure infrastructure and have to integrate message queues. It sounds quite simple: just create Azure Resource, write some code and then be happy! But what would you say if the resources are limited? What will you do if there are several teammates in your team, and all of you have to debug queues at the same time? Well, I know a minor life hack for my teams.
